title: Note Taking App
description: A simple but effective application to create and organise notes.
body: This project was created as part of a larger ongoing project focussed on creating, organising and searching user made inputs. Using TypeScript, the user can create markdown for any topic they choose and then apply as many appropriate tags as they wish. All tags and markdown can be edited, deleted or searched.

title: Pub Crawl Builder
description: A database of worldwide breweries allowing the user to add their own hidden gems and build their dream pub crawl.
body: This project was created as part of the AcademyXi Phase-2 React Module. It has a frontend application built with React and CSS which is hosted on Netlify and a separate backend built with Node and JSON connected via an API to act as a database for FETCH, POST, DELETE and PATCH requests from the frontend.

title: D&D Character Generator
body: This project was created as part of the AcademyXi Phase-1 JavaScript module. It is built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON. It uses the open Dungeons and Dragons 5e API and provides the user with the ability to generate random attributes for their character and to search the D&D database for information. It was designed to test my ability to fetch data from an API and manipulate it, this project is a passion piece with future development in store.

title: Foodzone Landing Page
description: A simple, informative landing page for nutrition software
body: I volunteered to create a landing page for Foodzone's nutrition software, the only requirement from the company was that I did the whole project in Tailwind Css and nothing else. This is my attempt. A simple, straightforward informative landing page using only Tailwind. Unfortunately I can't show you the code as it is not mine to share but the website is live and yours to peruse.

title: QR Code Generator
description: This is a simple web application that allows users to generate QR codes from text or URLs.
body: Built as an early API project, this small web app utilises basic HTML, CSS and JavaScript to take a user input, call an API and return a QR code for the input value. It is quick, clean and functional. The project gave me an introduction to using API's in my work.

title: Slot Machine App
description: A simple game app allowing users to bet on an outcome
body: DISCLAIMER: I do not condone gambling, if you or anyone you know is struggling with a gambling addiction, please visit https://www.gamblinghelponline.org.au/ for confidential and free support services.This project was built to help me learn and practice utilisation of arrays and loops in JavaScript, it randomises an array three times and then depending on the user input calculates if they win and by how much.
